text: The Toray Pan Pacific Open (東レ・パン・パシフィック・テニス) is a WTA Tour of tennis tournaments for women. It is held every year since 1984 in Tokyo, Japan. == Past finals == === Singles === Year Champion Runner-up Score 1984 Manuela Maleeva Claudia Kohde-Kilsch 3-6, 6-4, 6-4 1985 Manuela Maleeva Bonnie
